featured.text: The forces that are crushing individual lives and futures are also destroying the prospects for an entire region. 49.
Many of the whales died on the beach—crushed by their own weight.

definition.zh_def: 壓碎、碾碎或對某人產生強烈的愛慕之情。
definition.en_def: To press or squeeze with force, or to have a strong infatuation for someone.
definition.example: She has a crush on her classmate.
